original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sūpampi byañjanampi odanena paṭicchādenti bhiyyokamyataṁ upādāya …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū sūpam pi byañjanam pi odanena paṭicchādenti bhiyyokamyatam upādāya pe

original: “Na sūpaṁ vā byañjanaṁ vā odanena paṭicchādessāmi bhiyyokamyataṁ upādāyāti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na sūpam vā byañjanam vā odanena paṭicchādessāmi bhiyyokamyatam upādāya ati sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Na sūpaṁ vā byañjanaṁ vā odanena paṭicchādetabbaṁ bhiyyokamyataṁ upādāya.
analyzed: na sūpam vā byañjanam vā odanena paṭicchādetabbam bhiyyokamyatam upādāya

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca sūpaṁ vā byañjanaṁ vā odanena paṭicchādeti bhiyyokamyataṁ upādāya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca sūpam vā byañjanam vā odanena paṭicchādeti bhiyyokamyatam upādāya āpatti dukkaṭassa
